name: Bonescythe Waistguard
tooltip:
Bonescythe WaistguardLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Bonescythe Waistguard if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Waistguard, 8 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 5 Cured Rugged Hides, 1 Nexus Crystal and 15 gold pieces.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Waistguard
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 8
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
- Nexus Crystal
- Money:15
